Description: Red pottery ostracon, coarse fabric with a grey core, from the body of a vessel, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with remains of seven lines of black-painted demotic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389839) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389839)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
